description: Custom Gemini Code Assist commands for CTAS development

commands.name: ctas:ea-diagram
commands.description: Generate Enterprise Architecture diagrams using Gemini 2M

commands.name: ctas:devsecops-flow
commands.template: Generate a comprehensive DevSecOps flow diagram for CTAS v7.3.1 including: CI/CD pipeline, security gates (SAST, DAST, SCA), infrastructure as code, monitoring (Wazuh, AXON), and incident response. Output in Mermaid and PlantUML formats.

commands.name: ctas:component-analysis
commands.template: Analyze the React component architecture in CTAS v7.3.1. Identify: component hierarchy, data flow patterns, state management, prop drilling issues, performance bottlenecks, and refactoring opportunities. Focus on the PLASMA dashboard components.

commands.name: ctas:security-audit
commands.template: Perform a comprehensive security audit of CTAS v7.3.1 focusing on: trivariate hashing implementation, QEK obfuscation, ephemeral execution model, PGP signing, blockchain anchoring, and DoD compliance (NIST 800-53, FIPS 140-3). Identify vulnerabilities and provide remediation recommendations.

commands.name: ctas:data-flow
commands.template: Generate detailed data flow diagrams for CTAS v7.3.1 showing: Wazuh → AXON → PLASMA flow, OSINT → Neural Mux → Foundation flow, and Frontend → Backend → Database flows. Include data transformations, validation points, and storage decisions. Output in Mermaid format.

commands.name: ctas:integration-map
commands.template: Create a comprehensive integration map for CTAS v7.3.1 showing all external systems, APIs, databases, and services. Include: port numbers, protocols, authentication methods, data formats, and error handling strategies. Focus on Wazuh, AXON, SurrealDB, Supabase, and Neural Mux integrations.

commands.name: ctas:test-strategy
commands.description: Generate testing strategy and test cases
commands.template: Generate a comprehensive testing strategy for CTAS v7.3.1 including: unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests (Playwright), security tests, and performance tests. Provide specific test cases for PLASMA dashboard, trivariate hashing, and real-time streaming. Include test coverage goals and CI/CD integration.

commands.name: ctas:performance-analysis
commands.description: Analyze system performance and optimization opportunities
commands.template: Analyze CTAS v7.3.1 performance focusing on: React rendering optimization, bundle size reduction, API call efficiency, database query optimization, and real-time streaming performance. Identify bottlenecks in PLASMA dashboard and provide specific optimization recommendations with code examples.

commands.name: ctas:deployment-guide
commands.template: Generate comprehensive deployment documentation for CTAS v7.3.1 covering: local development setup, Docker deployment, OrbStack configuration, environment variables, database initialization, service dependencies, and troubleshooting guide. Include specific steps for deploying Wazuh, AXON, and PLASMA dashboard.

commands.name: ctas:api-documentation
commands.template: Generate comprehensive API documentation for CTAS v7.3.1 including: REST endpoints, WebSocket connections, SSE streams, request/response formats, authentication, error codes, and rate limiting. Focus on AXON client, Wazuh integration, and Neural Mux APIs. Output in OpenAPI 3.0 format.

commands.name: ctas:refactor-suggestions
commands.template: Analyze CTAS v7.3.1 codebase and suggest refactoring opportunities focusing on: code duplication, complex functions, prop drilling, state management improvements, type safety enhancements, and architectural patterns. Provide specific code examples for high-impact refactorings.

commands.name: ctas:dependency-audit
commands.description: Audit npm dependencies for security and updates
commands.template: Audit CTAS v7.3.1 npm dependencies for: security vulnerabilities, outdated packages, unused dependencies, bundle size impact, and license compliance. Provide prioritized update recommendations with breaking change analysis.

commands.name: ctas:usim-generator
commands.template: Generate USIM (Universal Symbolic Message) headers for CTAS v7.3.1 documentation including: trivariate hash, Unicode symbol, classification, metadata, and knowledge registry links. Follow CTAS Foundation v7.3.1 USIM specification.

commands.name: ctas:commit-message
commands.template: Generate a conventional commit message for the current changes following CTAS v7.3.1 standards: feat/fix/docs/style/refactor/test/chore, scope in parentheses, concise description, detailed body with technical context, and references to related issues or PRs.

commands.name: ctas:architecture-decision
commands.template: Create an Architecture Decision Record (ADR) for CTAS v7.3.1 including: context, decision, consequences, alternatives considered, and implementation notes. Follow ADR template format with status, date, and decision makers.

conventions: Follow CTAS naming conventions (kebab-case for files, PascalCase for components)
Include JSDoc comments for complex functions
Use font-mono for all text in PLASMA UI
Dark theme: bg-gray-900, text-gray-200, borders gray-800
